New_Brunswick.Rutgers Cancer Institute of New Jersey:
The Rutgers Cancer Institute of New Jersey (CINJ) is a cancer treatment and research institution that is a part of Rutgers University and located in New Brunswick, New Jersey. CINJ is one of only 49 Comprehensive Cancer Centers in the nation designated by the National Cancer Institute and the only one in New Jersey.
The Rutgers Cancer Institute of New Jersey is an Institute of Rutgers Biomedical and Health Sciences at Rutgers University and is located adjacent to Robert Wood Johnson University Hospital, which serves as its primary clinical affiliate.
